definition: thermos bottle/vacuum bottle/hot water dispenser (appliance)/CL:個|个[ge4]
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Thermos bottles are very popular in China.
I remember the feel of a hot water bottle between the sheets and little else.
sentences.chinese: 我只记得感觉到了床单中间热水瓶的温度。

sentences.english: Well, we'll send tea into the room when the visitors come.
sentences.chinese: 下战书我有几位朋侪来访，请给加些热水瓶和茶杯。

sentences.english: Always carry a reusable thermos and bring your own drink as much as possible.
sentences.chinese: 随身携带一个可重复使用热水瓶。

sentences.english: How about a thermos to keep the tea warm?
sentences.chinese: 热水瓶怎么样？可以给茶保温。

sentences.english: For a bathroom I have two thermos bottles of water and an enameled bowl.
sentences.chinese: 洗澡间里的两个热水瓶和一个搪瓷盆是用来洗澡的。

sentences.english: Choose to take a thermos or travel mug with you when you get your morning coffee instead of using a disposable cup.
sentences.chinese: 准备早餐咖啡时使用热水瓶或汽车杯取代一次性杯子。

sentences.english: Use a hot-water bottle or a heating pad set on low.
sentences.chinese: 用一个热水瓶或一个设定为低温的加热垫。

sentences.english: To the store and bought the thermos flask , thermos flask how good or bad check?
sentences.chinese: 到商店买的热水瓶，保温瓶好坏检查？

sentences.english: Mancini said he'd also seen a case caused by a hot water bottle.
sentences.chinese: 曼西尼说，他还见过一个由热水瓶而导致的案例。

sentences.english: James: Also, would you fill my thermos up with coffee?
sentences.chinese: 另外，你能将我的热水瓶灌满咖啡吗？

sentences.english: So the thermos is not an open system.
sentences.chinese: 因此热水瓶不是个开系。

sentences.english: Sometimes they serve tea in plastic thermoses.
sentences.chinese: 他们有时也会用塑料热水瓶泡茶。

sentences.english: Towel-wrapped warm water bottles or bags are a safe source of heat.
sentences.chinese: 包裹毛巾的热水瓶或袋是安全的热源。

definition: washbowl/basin for washing hands and face
washbowl/basin for washing hands and face/CL:個|个[ge4]
